channel.title: Why does the client name change when I JAR?
channel.description: Well, title says it all. When ever I JAR the client the client name changes, why is that? (InsidiaX source)

item.title: Why does the client name change when I JAR?
item.dc:creator: @liivapuu13 liivapuu13
item.description:
@liivapuu13 wrote:

at JFrame.java edit this: frame = new JFrame(“server name”);

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the client name change when I JAR?

item.title: Why does the client name change when I JAR?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

rich noob xd:

Well, I just changed the name to “Client”. The name which shows up is “InsidiaX TEST SERVER”. The name I am talking about is the one which shows up in the top left hand corner.

Did you compile before making a jar?

Read full topic
item.source: Why does the client name change when I JAR?
